title: About
children: I am 25 years old. I am from Tajikistan. I moved to Turkey for university when I was 19 and I lived there for 6 years. I worked there for some companies. After that I moved back to Tajikistan and only after 2 months I moved to Russia to get my master's degree. I am still in Russia.

Programming since 2008. I started with algorithms, studied varies of them including graph theory, game theory, number theory and etc. I have experience in different fields of programming like web, desktop and Aurduino. I have also experience as a web security analyst. I earned many medals, awards and certificates by participating in different competitions and conferences.
Not counting my native language, I am fluent in 4 foreign languages. These are English, Turkish, Persian and Russian. I also know some Arabic and a little French. It is kind of hobby for me.

I have got Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering and currently getting my Master of Engineering degree in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science. One of my work were related to using Data Mining in this case Text Mining, in search engines. The results were better than I thought it would be. The success rate was up to 87%. Currently working on my own MVC framework in PHP which uses the plug and play technology to make it easier to setup any project.
Although I achieved many of my goals in life, my journey is not over.
